content.prompt: A charged rod is placed near a grounded conducting sphere. The rod is moved away, and then the ground is removed. What is the resulting charge, if any, on the sphere after the process is complete?

choices.label: A net charge whose sign cannot be determined

topic.text: 10.2: Conservation of Electric Charge and the Process of Charging

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
